issue.title: trendpick.shopping.naver.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://trendpick.shopping.naver.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftrendpick.shopping.naver.com)
### Comment
> Hello there!
> 
> When using dns.adguard.com as Private DNS on Android, the domain trendpick.shopping.naver.com (TrendPick) is inaccessible from multiple browsers including Samsung Internet and Chrome. This domain is part of Naver Shopping, a major South Korean shopping platform (shopping.naver.com).
> 
> This is particularly concerning because TrendPick links appear on the main page of shopping.naver.com for logged-in users. Even though the links are marked as "AD" (See the second screenshot in AdGuard Disabled), many users often don't notice this and might end up thinking their error page encounter is due to a network or browser issue, rather than AdGuard DNS.
> 
> Could you take a look into this and consider allowlisting trendpick.shopping.naver.com if possible? Thank you so much!
Username: `@osori`

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lgtfool2itwogc4kgk884wsg48k44k8h8cypxoo4s8.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/acvv9aiwk68kck8so48s8oswk0k48wg4cbh7vcl0mi.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4jeacxr39oo40wcsccgwck800ksckkw56jp8q66dto.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | Android 14, Samsung One UI 6.1.1
Browser: | Samsung Browser

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/185154#issuecomment-2268200228 можете включить фильтр раздражителей, но рекомендуется установить AdGuard Extra,
Учтите, что сам браузер рекламный и препятствует работе расширения как на своих, так и бывших сервисах. В этом случае его лучше поменять на другой или установить программу вместо расширения.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Commits
  • 52f6eef chore(changeset): release (#1462)
  • 8d8fe23 build: update repository url in package.json
  • f0480f0 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1461)"
  • 1da81c0 chore(changeset): release (#1461)
  • cc04e08 ci: add required permission for provenance generation
  • fa2dac8 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1455)"
  • 8325985 chore(changeset): release (#1455)
  • 92f295f build(deps): update dependencies (#1460)
  • 5293c09 build: generate provenance statements for npm package (#1459)
  • f184fff Merge pull request #1454 from Falcion/master
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=lint-staged&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=15.2.7&new-version=15.2.8)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

It does work fine, but you should deal with the cookies, otherwise the video won't work.
However, you can just enable AdGuard Annoyances / Cookie Notices.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

On my end it's caused by `Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List` and this rule:
```adblock
comicsands.com#@#div[class$=-sticky-share]
```
fixes it.

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look?

comment.body:
Yes, updating filters will only work normally if you update the extension. YouTube is no exception.

When Chromium will remove Mv2 support, you can install Firefox or last Chrome with Mv2 support and block updates. Not the best option, but Chrome's functionality has been getting worse for years - they have been messing up what is not messed up yet and fixing vulnerabilities.

 [http://trendpick.shopping.naver.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftrendpick.shopping.naver.com)
### Comment
> Hello there!
> 
> When using dns.adguard.com as Private DNS on Android, the domain trendpick.shopping.naver.com (TrendPick) is inaccessible from multiple browsers including Samsung Internet and Chrome. This domain is part of Naver Shopping, a major South Korean shopping platform (shopping.naver.com).
> 
> This is particularly concerning because TrendPick links appear on the main page of shopping.naver.com for logged-in users. Even though the links are marked as "AD" (See the second screenshot in AdGuard Disabled), many users often don't notice this and might end up thinking their error page encounter is due to a network or browser issue, rather than AdGuard DNS.
> 
> Could you take a look into this and consider allowlisting trendpick.shopping.naver.com if possible? Thank you so much!

pull_request.title: Bump husky from 9.1.1 to 9.1.4
pull_request.body:
Bumps [husky](https://github.com/typicode/husky) from 9.1.1 to 9.1.4.
Release notes

Sourced from husky's releases.

v9.1.4

  • Improve deprecation notice

v9.1.3

  • fix: better handle space in PATH

v9.1.2

Show a message instead of automatically removing deprecated code.

This only concerns projects that still have the following code in their hooks:

- #!/usr/bin/env sh # <- This is deprecated, remove it
- . "$(dirname -- "$0")/_/husky.sh"  # <- This is deprecated, remove it

Rest of your hook code

Hooks with these lines will fail in v10.0.0

Commits
  • fc549e0 9.1.4
  • 9891ace clarify deprecation message
  • 712cb00 9.1.3
  • 7d29633 fix: better handle spaces in PATH
  • 35fba84 9.1.2

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

> If you don't allow `gtm.js` on this website, `https://turkcell.api.useinsider.com/ins.js` doesn't come, when this link is not allowed, `turkcell.api.useinsider.com/worker-new.html` doesn't come.

I checked it. A few years ago, the problem was with this element:

<details>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/465c78b9-9811-426c-a75a-657a644520f9)

</details>

Please provide direct links with the problem.

comment.body:
Alex,   I've dropped all but one of my MV2's, and everything is ok so far,
but have you seen this regarding some MV3 changes?...
https://youtu.be/xuwpvrtXyfk?t=424

On Mon, Aug 5, 2024 at 6:04 AM Alex ***@***.***> wrote:

> Yes, updating filters will only work normally if you update the extension.
> YouTube is no exception.
>
> When Chromium will remove Mv2 support, you can install Firefox or last
> Chrome with Mv2 support and block updates. Not the best option, but
> Chrome's functionality has been getting worse for years - they have been
> messing up what is not messed up yet and fixing vulnerabilities.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/185282#issuecomment-2268690774>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AFBYSEVQD4XW6KUQKUCPWRTZP5E4RAVCNFSM6AAAAABL4VKZXWVHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMZDENRYGY4TANZXGQ>

comment.body:
https://www.turkcell.com.tr/pasaj/hobi-oyun/dijital-urunler/oyun-pinleri-uyelikler/google-play-hediye-kodu-500-tl Since there is a campaign on the product in this link, there is a bar above the price information that writes the campaign information. This is what I showed in SShot 2 in the comment above. The small circle I showed in Sshot 1 is the marking for the title given to successful sellers. Since it is not on every seller, you can see that mark for example on the product in the link below, on some sellers in the "Other sellers" section at the bottom. I have marked it in sshot3, which I have just thrown. It can change because the website shows the cheapest seller on the right. "https://www.turkcell.com.tr/pasaj/cep-telefonu/ios-telefonlar/iphone-13-128-gb"
Sshot3

![Sshot3](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7c295171-7f93-49e2-adc0-b17cd2d23177)

These images I have marked are uploaded through `image.useinsider.com`. When the ||cdn.personaclick.com/v3.js filter was added to Adguard last week, this website lost the "Taken Together" tab that you showed in your first image. Removing this filter brought this field back. That part is ok. But removing the previously allowed @@||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$domain=turkcell.com.tr filter, and only removing the `@@||api.useinsider.com^$domain=turkcell.com.tr filter` Not adding `@@|turkcell.api.useinsider.com/ins.js$script` and `@@|turkcell.api.useinsider.com/worker-new.html$subdocument` filters caused the problem I mentioned in the comment above. `turkcell.com.tr#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Notification.requestPermission', 'noopFunc')` filter will not be needed anyway. `eitri.api.useinsider.com/static/native-push-sdk.js` is notifying the site and the `||api.useinsider.com` generic filter will continue to block it. Also please don't remove the `||api.personaclick.com/push` filter, it blocks notification on a few sites I know of.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175393) if other issue.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175538) if other issue.

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

Other ad blocker

none, uBlock Origin 1.59.0

Website or app doesn't work properly

Brave 1.68.134 Chromium: 127.0.6533.88 (Official Build) (arm64) 

other (specify in comment below)

Desktop

https://budgetlightforum.com/

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

https://budgetlightforum.com/

comment.body:
> @SeriousHoax Hm. I still see this rule in https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/2.txt

That's very odd. After seeing your comment, I visited the site again to see if the filter was updated automatically but no, the problem existed. Then I updated the filters manually, reloaded the page and the issue is gone. Don't see the rule being applied on filtering logs either. 
Did differential update somehow make this happen?
